content:
Should be a straightforward PR - this takes the definition of algebra R Aᵒᵖ and pushes most of it down to the base classes, semimodule R Aᵒᵖ through has_scalar R Aᵒᵖ. Thought I'd ping since it's sat there for a week or so.

The key result here is op_linear_equiv, which I need to define reversion in the exterior algebra as roughly exterior_algebra.lift op_linear_equiv.to_linear_map
Just took a look at it, it looks good to me.
